data.eml:eml: Parotocinclus yaka, a new species of armored catfish (Loricariidae: Hypoptopomatinae), from the Amazon basin in Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lehmann, Pablo, Lima, Flávio C. T., Reis, Roberto E. (2018): Parotocinclus yaka, a new species of armored catfish (Loricariidae: Hypoptopomatinae), from the Amazon basin in Brazil. Zootaxa 4521 (4): 584-592, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4521.4.7
